body: i’m thankful to imagine [michael jackson coming down in his hotel room after a show by reading frank o'hara](https://twitter.com/AndrewEpstein3/status/929444993873346561). i'm thankful for [odes to joy](https://soundcloud.com/meghankathleen/ode-to-joy-frank-o-hara). i'm thankful it's possible to walk on [the moon](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=alo3KFRfLvE) without leaving the earth.
